name: Oni (itch) (galrubin13)
description:
Oni is a single player Puzzle/Platformer game. Play as little Oni, the overlord of the underworld, and collect lava balls to create platforms and advance the tree in order to escape the depth of hell.

Designers: Gal Rubin, Michal Shatz

Developers: Alon Levy, Nati Adi

Game Jam class, Bezalel 2022
